sentences.english: Chlamydia screening is recommended for all pregnant women.
sentences.chinese: 所有孕妇有必要行衣原体筛查。

sentences.english: An expressing vector of major outer-membrane protein of Chlamydia psittaci was constructed.
sentences.chinese: 主要外膜蛋白在鹦鹉热衣原体感染过程中起主要作用。

sentences.english: Two common sexually transmitted infections are chlamydia and gonorrhea.
sentences.chinese: 两种常见的性传播感染是衣原体和支原体。

sentences.english: Causes the NGU pathogen mainly for the blister mantle bacteria reconciliation urine mycoplasma.
sentences.chinese: 引起NGU的病原体主要为沙眼衣原体和解尿支原体。

sentences.english: It is caused by the chlamydia trachomatis bacterium.
sentences.chinese: 它是由沙眼衣原体细菌。

sentences.english: Chlamydia also can affect sperm motility, cause sexual dysfunction.
sentences.chinese: 衣原体还可影响精子活力，造成性功能障碍。

sentences.english: Clap diplococcus returns the recrudesce of former to trachoma garment put oneself in another's position to rise to accelerate effect.
sentences.chinese: 淋病双球菌还对沙眼衣原体的复发起到加速作用。

sentences.english: Chlamydia in the male may be almost symptom-free.
sentences.chinese: 男性感染衣原体几乎没什么症状。

sentences.english: But there is no evidence of the relationship with Chlamydia psittaci infection and of the ocular adnexal lymphomas stage and prognosis.
sentences.chinese: 暂未发现鹦鹉热衣原体感染和疾病的分期及预后有关。

sentences.english: The most frequently reported STD was HIV/AIDS, followed by chlamydia.
sentences.chinese: 其中，最常见的性病为艾滋病，其次为衣原体感染。

sentences.english: Regular partners should still have chlamydia and blood tests.
sentences.chinese: 对经常的性伙伴还需要进行衣原体和血液检测。

sentences.english: Objective Aim To evaluate three laboratory diagnosis of Chlamydia trachomatis infection of urogenital tract.
sentences.chinese: 目的比较三种泌尿生殖道沙眼衣原体实验室检测方法。

sentences.english: The prevalence of gonorrhea and chlamydia are increasing.
sentences.chinese: 目前，患有衣原体感染和淋病的人数正日益增加。

sentences.english: Objective To look into the relation between genital Chlamydia trachomatis infection and infertility.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨生殖道沙眼衣原体感染与不育症的关系。

sentences.english: Major outer membrane protein plays a key role in the infection of Chlamydia psittaci.
sentences.chinese: 主要外膜蛋白在鹦鹉热衣原体感染过程中起主要作用。

definition: gonococcus/Neisseria gonorrhoeae, the pathogen causing gonorrhea
vaginal infection/inflammation of the vulva or vagina/colpitis

pinyin: dan1 chun2 pao4 zhen3 bing4 du2
